targets.query: SELECT median("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_system") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT median("utilization_gpu") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("utilization_gpu") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "index", "name" fill(null)
SELECT last("memory_total") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "index", "name" fill(null)
SELECT median("memory_used") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "index", "name" fill(null)
SELECT median("temp_input") FROM "sensors" WHERE ("chip" = 'coretemp-isa-0000' AND "feature" = 'package_id_0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT median("temp_input") FROM "sensors" WHERE ("chip" = 'coretemp-isa-0001' AND "feature" = 'package_id_1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT median("temp_input") FROM "sensors" WHERE ("chip" = 'coretemp-isa-0000' AND "feature" = 'package_id_0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT median("temp_input") FROM "sensors" WHERE ("chip" = 'coretemp-isa-0001' AND "feature" = 'package_id_1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("temperature_gpu") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("temperature_gpu") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "index", "name" fill(null)
SELECT last("clocks_current_graphics") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "index", "name" fill(null)
SELECT last("clocks_current_memory") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "index", "name" fill(null)
SELECT last("clocks_current_sm") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "index", "name" fill(null)
SELECT last("clocks_current_video") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "index", "name" fill(null)
SELECT last("memory_used") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("physical_thermal_fpga_temp") AS "fpga_temp", last("physical_thermal_pcb_btm_front") AS "pcb_btm_front", last("physical_thermal_pcb_top_front") AS "pcb_top_front", last("physical_thermal_pcb_top_rear") AS "pcb_top_rear", last("physical_thermal_vccint_temp") AS "vccint" FROM "exec_xilinx_xbutil" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ipmi_sensor" WHERE ("unit" = 'rpm' AND "name" =~ /fan[a-z0-9].*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ipmi_sensor" WHERE ("unit" = 'degrees_c') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /cpu[0-9].*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT mean("cpu_usage") FROM "procstat" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "process_name"
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /cpu[0-9].*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) , "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT median("temp_input") FROM "sensors" WHERE ("chip" = 'coretemp-isa-0000' AND "feature" = 'package_id_0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT median("temp_input") FROM "sensors" WHERE ("chip" = 'coretemp-isa-0001' AND "feature" = 'package_id_1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("memory_used") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("memory_used") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("memory_used") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
